author: senh
title: Dramatic lightning strike lights up plane
text: BING NEWS: Dramatic footage of electrical storm captured from on board United Airlines passenger jet The footage shows the dark sky and lights of the city beneath the plane. You can clearly see the storm clouds and flashes of lightning which illuminate the evening. Illinois was rocked by massive storms last week, even interrupting the music festival ... 08/5/2015 - 3:57 am | View Link The Most Dramatic Shorelines in the U.S. If this is a scene you could only imagine in a foreign country, than you should take a look at the dramatic shorelines in the U.S. Click Here to see the Complete List of The Most Dramatic Shorelines in the U.S. Sometimes great undiscovered treasure is ... 08/3/2015 - 8:21 am | View Link Lightning bolts illuminate night skies in dramatic pictures taken by brave photographer Several bolts of lightning strike a city, in Sardinia, Italy. The 26-year-old braved the violent lightning storm to take pictures of the stunning natural phenomenon. In one terrifying image a bright bolt lights up a mushroom cloud that hovers above a ... 06/20/2015 - 12:06 am | View Link Honda shows off dramatic new Civic coupe at New York show Honda says the new car was redesigned top to bottom, with U.S. engineers and designers taking the lead. Itâ€™s got single-line LED tail lights and a mean-looking front grille. The distance between the front and rear wheels is longer, and the car will get ... 04/1/2015 - 6:09 pm | View Link Now that's lightning! Video captures dramatic strike as homes are hit, fires started and trains disrupted in night of storms This is the moment lightning lights up the sky above Wales as homes were struck and train services disrupted by storms that rumbled through the night. This lightning strike over Rhyl was posted on Vine by Allen Heard, who was filming towards Meliden.
